nodes.text: This OOM security battle droid was stationed on the Separatist planet Lola Sayu in the Citadel prison around 21 BBY at the time of the Battle of Lola Sayu and was under command of prison warden, Phindian Osi Sobeck. After the elite team of clone troopers led by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker escaped the prison with Jedi Master Even Piell, this droid was ordered by Sobeck to release a group of Anoobas and to contact him as soon as the fugitives have been located.
This droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
